body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Millburn Motors. My name is Joshua Miller. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Julie. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am feeling angry because I have been waiting for my car delivery for one zero days and it hasn't arrived yet.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the delay, Julie. Can you provide me with your order number and contact phone number, so I can look into this for you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My order number is seven eight nine zero six five and my contact phone number is five five five six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Julie. I will investigate this matter and get back to you as soon as possible.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your frustration, and we will do our best to resolve this issue promptly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help, Joshua. I appreciate it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Julie. Thank you for reaching out to us. We will be in touch soon. Have a great day!
